We operate under the consumer brands Virgin Media (UK and Ireland), Ziggo (Netherlands; joint venture VodafoneZiggo), Telenet (Belgium) and UPC (Switzerland, Poland and Slovakia). We invest in the infrastructure that empowers our customers to make the most of the digital revolution. Liberty Global has a representative office to the European Union Institutions in Brussels. We use this as a base for dialogue with the European Commission, Members of the European Parliament, and the EU competition authority on public policy and regulatory issues, and in order to maintain relations with key EU trade and industry associations.
